## MapViewPowerPreference enum

Hint for the WebGL implementation on which power mode to prefer.

 https://www.khronos.org/registry/webgl/specs/latest/1.0/\#5.14.12

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum MapViewPowerPreference 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Default | <code>&quot;default&quot;</code> | Default value. |
|  HighPerformance | <code>&quot;high-performance&quot;</code> | Maximum performance. |
|  LowPower | <code>&quot;low-power&quot;</code> | Lower power mode, used to conserve energy. |
